name: Chamo - The little crawler
description:
Chamo the little cralwer is a 2D platformer where you will play as a little hungry chameleon. You have ONLY ONE way of interacting with the environment, your tonge. Use it to move you aroung and stick everywhere, your OBJECTIVE is eating the 5 bugs that are placed in different spots, each bug eaten will increase your tongue length! 

Click to throw your tongue to a surface, mantain and Chamo will stick to it.
Play it on FullScreen!
